abstract: The deadline that Microsoft imposed on Yahoo to reach a negotiated merger agreement passed April 26, and the two companies are still not talking.
snippet: The deadline that Microsoft imposed on Yahoo to reach a negotiated merger agreement passed April 26, and the two companies are still not talking.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The deadline that Microsoft imposed on Yahoo to reach a negotiated merger agreement passed three days ago, and the two companies are still not talking.

headline.main: No Break in the Standoff of Microsoft and Yahoo
headline.print_headline: No Break in the Standoff Of Microsoft and Yahoo

abstract: If Microsoft dropped its bid for Yahoo, it would be admitting it couldn’t really catch up to Google for consumer Web services. And with $29 billion in the company bank account, Steve Ballmer simply isn’t ready to accept that. As a result, it is likely to proceed with its bid for Yahoo despite the many risks.
snippet: If Microsoft dropped its bid for Yahoo, it would be admitting it couldn’t really catch up to Google for consumer Web services. And with $29 billion in the company bank account, Steve Ballmer simply isn’t ready to accept that. As a result, it is li...
lead_paragraph: Why is Microsoft taking its sweet time showing its next move in the battle for Yahoo? I suspect it is simply arranging the forces for its next attack.

headline.main: Why Steve Ballmer Will Keep Chasing Yahoo
